Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>、<Eugene>、軍を出てから <Veigue>に会うまでは、どんな旅だったんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>, <Eugene>, after you left the army, what were your travels like before you met <Veigue>?
We fought against various Force users...

Entry.JapaneseText: そうそう、暴走してる人を止めたり、 <Eugene>を逆恨みした人に襲われたりネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yep, things like pacifying people who were going berserk and getting attacked by folks who had it out for <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: へえぇ、大変だったんだなぁ。
でも、楽しかったヨ！ おかげでイロイロな フォルスを知るコトができたし……
Entry.EnglishText: But it was fun too! Thanks to that, we were able to learn about all different kinds of Force...

Entry.JapaneseText: 絶対に負けなかったもんネ！
